channel.title: Android on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Android on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Chrome OS is “combining” with Android, but what does that mean?
item.description: Google’s Sameer Samat doesn’t get into what “combining” means.

item.title: Google’s Android head confirms Chrome OS and Android are merging
item.description: Google’s Sameer Samat doesn’t get into what “combining” means.

item.title: Google exec: ‘We’re going to be combining ChromeOS and Android’
item.description: Google’s head of Android has said that the company plans to combine its mobile operating system with ChromeOS, the software that currently runs across Google’s Chromebook laptops. Sameer Samat, presid

item.title: Google exec: ‘We’re going to be combining ChromeOS and Android’
item.description: Google’s head of Android has said that the company plans to combine its mobile operating system with ChromeOS, the software that currently runs across Google’s Chromebook laptops. Sameer Samat, presid

item.title: 10 Best Android Phones of 2025, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Shopping for a phone can be an ordeal. That’s why we’ve tested almost every Android phone, from the smartest to the cheapest—even phones that fold—to find those worth your money.

item.title: 10 Best Android Phones of 2025, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Shopping for a phone can be an ordeal. That’s why we’ve tested almost every Android phone, from the smartest to the cheapest—even phones that fold—to find those worth your money.
